item.title: Capitol rioter with "kill list" convicted of plot to murder FBI agents
item.description: Edward Kelley distributed a "kill list" and videos containing images of FBI employees to another person as part of his "mission," prosecutors say.

item.title: Chris Stapleton wins 4 CMAs but Morgan Wallen named entertainer of the year
item.description: Chris Stapleton took home four Country Music Association Awards and hardly left the stage on Wednesday night, while an absent Morgan Wallen won the ni...

item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: Banana duct-taped to wall sells for $6.2 million at NYC art auction
item.description: A piece of conceptual art consisting of a banana duct-taped to a wall sold for $6.2 million at an auction in New York on Wednesday.
